Operation 'repertoire' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary uses generic French term 'Gestion repertoire' which is unclear. Description lacks clarity on what is returned and the side effects of modifying the directory. Added details about expected inputs (directory ID, number list), return value (confirmation and status), and side effects (directory modification affecting campaigns) for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Ajoute ou supprime une liste de numros  un rpertoire existant.
data.summary_suggestion: Add or remove numbers from directory
data.description_suggestion: Adds or removes a list of phone numbers to/from an existing directory. Specify the directory ID and provide the list of numbers to add or remove. Returns confirmation of the operation with the updated directory status. This operation modifies the directory contents and affects which numbers are included in future SMS campaigns.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses generic French term 'Gestion repertoire' which is unclear. Description lacks clarity on what is returned and the side effects of modifying the directory. Added details about expected inputs (directory ID, number list), return value (confirmation and status), and side effects (directory modification affecting campaigns) for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'addShortlink' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary and description are identical and extremely vague. No context about what a shortlink is used for in this SMS API context, what inputs are expected, or what is returned. Added domain context (SMS usage, tracking), clarified inputs (long URL, optional alias), specified return value (shortened link), and explained the business purpose (engagement tracking) for AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: add a shortlink
data.summary_suggestion: Create a shortened URL link
data.description_suggestion: Creates a shortened URL link for use in SMS messages. Accepts a long URL and optional custom alias. Returns the shortened link that can be included in SMS content. The shortened link enables tracking of click-through rates and user engagement in SMS campaigns.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are identical and extremely vague. No context about what a shortlink is used for in this SMS API context, what inputs are expected, or what is returned. Added domain context (SMS usage, tracking), clarified inputs (long URL, optional alias), specified return value (shortened link), and explained the business purpose (engagement tracking) for AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'sendSms' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable. Description lacks important details about what is returned (message ID, status) and side effects (credit deduction). Added return value details and credit deduction side effect to help AI agents understand the full operation impact and determine if they have sufficient credits before attempting to send.

data.current_description: Envoi un sms vers un unique destinataire
data.description_suggestion: Sends an SMS message to a single recipient. Accepts the recipient phone number, message content, and optional parameters (sender ID, scheduling, etc.). Returns a response containing the message ID, delivery status, and credit deduction. The operation deducts credits from the account based on message length and destination.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description lacks important details about what is returned (message ID, status) and side effects (credit deduction). Added return value details and credit deduction side effect to help AI agents understand the full operation impact and determine if they have sufficient credits before attempting to send.

message: Operation 'sendSmsMulti' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is incomplete - it doesn't specify what is returned or the credit deduction side effect. Added details about return values (campaign ID, message statuses, credit deduction) and clarified the side effect of credit deduction to help AI agents understand the operation's full impact and resource requirements.

data.current_description: Envoi de SMS vers 1 ou plusieurs destinataires
data.description_suggestion: Sends SMS messages to one or multiple recipients in a single request. Accepts a list of recipient phone numbers, message content, and optional parameters (sender ID, scheduling, campaign tracking, etc.). Returns a response containing the campaign ID, individual message statuses, and total credit deduction. The operation deducts credits from the account based on the number of messages and their lengths.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is incomplete - it doesn't specify what is returned or the credit deduction side effect. Added details about return values (campaign ID, message statuses, credit deduction) and clarified the side effect of credit deduction to help AI agents understand the operation's full impact and resource requirements.

data.current_description: Ajoute un sous compte
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new sub-account under the main account. Accepts sub-account details such as name, email, and optional credit allocation. Returns the newly created sub-account information including the sub-account ID and API key. The new sub-account can be used independently for SMS operations with its own credit balance and API credentials.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable but description is minimal and repetitive. Missing details about what inputs are expected, what is returned (sub-account ID, API key), and the side effects (independent operation capability, separate credit balance). Added these details to help AI agents understand the full scope of sub-account creation and its implications.

data.current_description: Edit a subaccount
data.description_suggestion: Modifies an existing sub-account's configuration and settings. Accepts the sub-account ID and fields to update such as name, email, credit limits, API permissions, and status. Returns the updated sub-account information reflecting all changes. Partial updates are supported - only provided fields will be modified.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is minimal and repetitive. Missing critical details about what can be edited (name, email, credit limits, permissions, status), what is returned (updated sub-account info), and whether partial updates are supported. message: Operation 'getCampagne' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary is passive and vague. Description lacks clarity about required parameters, their format, and what specific data is included in the response. Added actionable language, explicit parameter names, format specifications, and details about CSV content for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne
data.current_description:
Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne en fonction d'une date de dbut et d'une date de fin. 

Les dates sont au format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm. 

Le fichier rapport de campagne est sous la forme d'un fichier zip + contenant un fichier csv contenant le dtail des envois.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve SMS campaign report for date range
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a detailed campaign report containing all SMS messages sent within a specified date range. Requires start date (date_debut) and end date (date_fin) in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm format. Returns a ZIP file containing a CSV report with detailed information about each SMS sent, including delivery status, recipient, timestamp, and other relevant metrics.
data.reasoning: Original summary is passive and vague. Description lacks clarity about required parameters, their format, and what specific data is included in the response. Added actionable language, explicit parameter names, format specifications, and details about CSV content for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'comptage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary has grammatical issues and is unclear about the actual purpose. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the relationship between character count and SMS segments, or what the output represents. Added clarity about SMS segmentation logic, encoding considerations, character limits, and practical use case for credit estimation.

data.current_description: Compte le nombre de SMS necessaire  un envoi
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate SMS count for message text
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the number of SMS segments required to send a message based on its character count and encoding. Accepts message text and optional parameters for encoding type and special character handling. Returns the total number of SMS units needed for delivery, accounting for SMS length limits (160 characters for standard encoding, 70 for Unicode). Useful for estimating credit consumption before sending.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical issues and is unclear about the actual purpose. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the relationship between character count and SMS segments, or what the output represents. Added clarity about SMS segmentation logic, encoding considerations, character limits, and practical use case for credit estimation.

message: Operation 'getCredit' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary uses vague technical jargon ('Interrogation'). Description lacks detail about what the credit represents, the return format, and authentication requirements. Enhanced with clarity about return value, currency context, and practical use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Retourne le credit existant associe au compte.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve account credit balance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current credit balance associated with the authenticated account. Returns the available credit amount in the account's currency. This operation requires valid account credentials (keyid) and is used to check available funds before sending SMS campaigns or performing other credit-consuming operations.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses vague technical jargon ('Interrogation'). Description lacks detail about what the credit represents, the return format, and authentication requirements. Enhanced with clarity about return value, currency context, and practical use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'delListeNoire' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, inconsistent_terminology, missing_output_details. Critical issue: summary says 'Ajoute' (add) but description says 'Supprime' (remove) - contradictory. The description is correct based on the operation path '/dellistenoire'. Changed summary to accurately reflect deletion action. Added clarity about the effect of the operation, what happens to the number, and the relationship to blacklist management.

data.current_summary: Ajoute un numero en liste noire
data.current_description: Supprime un numero en liste noire
data.summary_suggestion: Remove phone number from blacklist
data.description_suggestion: Removes a phone number from the blacklist (liste noire). The specified number will no longer be blocked from receiving SMS messages. Requires the phone number to be provided in the request. Returns confirmation of successful removal or error if the number was not found on the blacklist. This operation reverses the effect of adding a number to the blacklist.
data.reasoning: Critical issue: summary says 'Ajoute' (add) but description says 'Supprime' (remove) - contradictory. The description is correct based on the operation path '/dellistenoire'. Changed summary to accurately reflect deletion action. Added clarity about the effect of the operation, what happens to the number, and the relationship to blacklist management.

message: Operation 'getListeNoire' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary has grammatical error ('le liste' should be 'la liste'). Description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is in the CSV or the practical use case. Added clarity about file format, CSV contents, metadata included, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Retourne un fichier csv zipp contenant la liste noire
data.summary_suggestion: Download blacklist as compressed CSV file
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete blacklist (liste noire) as a compressed ZIP file containing a CSV report. The CSV file includes all phone numbers currently on the blacklist with associated metadata such as date added, reason for blacklisting, and status. Useful for auditing blocked numbers and managing SMS delivery restrictions. Returns a downloadable ZIP archive ready for import or analysis.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical error ('le liste' should be 'la liste'). Description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is in the CSV or the practical use case. Added clarity about file format, CSV contents, metadata included, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'getHlr' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is vague about what HLR means and what the operation actually does. Description lacks detail about input format, what data is returned, and why this operation is useful. Added explanation of HLR acronym, input/output details, network information returned, and practical use case for campaign optimization.

data.current_description: Ralise un lookup HLR sur les numros
data.summary_suggestion: Perform HLR lookup on phone numbers
data.description_suggestion: Performs an HLR (Home Location Register) lookup on one or more phone numbers to verify their validity and retrieve network information. Accepts phone numbers in international format. Returns detailed information including network operator, country, roaming status, and number validity status. HLR lookup confirms whether a number is active on the network and can receive SMS, helping optimize campaign delivery and reduce failed sends.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about what HLR means and what the operation actually does. Description lacks detail about input format, what data is returned, and why this operation is useful. Added explanation of HLR acronym, input/output details, network information returned, and practical use case for campaign optimization.

data.current_description: Ajoute ou supprime une liste de numros  un rpertoire existant.
data.summary_suggestion: Add or remove numbers from directory
data.description_suggestion: Adds or removes a list of phone numbers to/from an existing directory. Specify the directory ID and provide the list of numbers to add or remove. Returns confirmation of the operation with the updated directory status. This operation modifies the directory contents and affects which numbers are included in future SMS campaigns.

data.current_description: Envoi de SMS vers 1 ou plusieurs destinataires
data.description_suggestion: Sends SMS messages to one or multiple recipients in a single request. data.current_summary: Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne
data.current_description:
Retourne les SMS envoys sur une priode donne en fonction d'une date de dbut et d'une date de fin. 

Les dates sont au format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm. 

Le fichier rapport de campagne est sous la forme d'un fichier zip + contenant un fichier csv contenant le dtail des envois.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve SMS campaign report for date range
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a detailed campaign report containing all SMS messages sent within a specified date range. Requires start date (date_debut) and end date (date_fin) in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm format. Returns a ZIP file containing a CSV report with detailed information about each SMS sent, including delivery status, recipient, timestamp, and other relevant metrics.
data.reasoning: Original summary is passive and vague. Description lacks clarity about required parameters, their format, and what specific data is included in the response. Added actionable language, explicit parameter names, format specifications, and details about CSV content for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

Original summary has grammatical issues and is unclear about the actual purpose. data.current_description: Compte le nombre de SMS necessaire  un envoi
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate SMS count for message text
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the number of SMS segments required to send a message based on its character count and encoding. Accepts message text and optional parameters for encoding type and special character handling. Returns the total number of SMS units needed for delivery, accounting for SMS length limits (160 characters for standard encoding, 70 for Unicode). Useful for estimating credit consumption before sending.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical issues and is unclear about the actual purpose. Description is too brief and doesn't explain the relationship between character count and SMS segments, or what the output represents. Added clarity about SMS segmentation logic, encoding considerations, character limits, and practical use case for credit estimation.

data.current_description: Retourne le credit existant associe au compte.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve account credit balance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current credit balance associated with the authenticated account. Returns the available credit amount in the account's currency. data.current_summary: Ajoute un numero en liste noire
data.current_description: Supprime un numero en liste noire
data.summary_suggestion: Remove phone number from blacklist
data.description_suggestion: Removes a phone number from the blacklist (liste noire). The specified number will no longer be blocked from receiving SMS messages. Requires the phone number to be provided in the request. Returns confirmation of successful removal or error if the number was not found on the blacklist. This operation reverses the effect of adding a number to the blacklist.
data.reasoning: Critical issue: summary says 'Ajoute' (add) but description says 'Supprime' (remove) - contradictory. The description is correct based on the operation path '/dellistenoire'. Changed summary to accurately reflect deletion action. Added clarity about the effect of the operation, what happens to the number, and the relationship to blacklist management.

message: Operation 'getListeNoire' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary has grammatical error ('le liste' should be 'la liste'). Description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is in the CSV or the practical use case. Added clarity about file format, CSV contents, metadata included, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Retourne un fichier csv zipp contenant la liste noire
data.summary_suggestion: Download blacklist as compressed CSV file
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete blacklist (liste noire) as a compressed ZIP file containing a CSV report. The CSV file includes all phone numbers currently on the blacklist with associated metadata such as date added, reason for blacklisting, and status. Useful for auditing blocked numbers and managing SMS delivery restrictions. Returns a downloadable ZIP archive ready for import or analysis.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical error ('le liste' should be 'la liste'). Description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is in the CSV or the practical use case. Added clarity about file format, CSV contents, metadata included, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

Original summary is vague about what HLR means and what the operation actually does. Description lacks detail about input format, what data is returned, and why this operation is useful. Added explanation of HLR acronym, input/output details, network information returned, and practical use case for campaign optimization.

data.current_description: Ralise un lookup HLR sur les numros
data.summary_suggestion: Perform HLR lookup on phone numbers
data.description_suggestion: Performs an HLR (Home Location Register) lookup on one or more phone numbers to verify their validity and retrieve network information. Accepts phone numbers in international format. Returns detailed information including network operator, country, roaming status, and number validity status. HLR lookup confirms whether a number is active on the network and can receive SMS, helping optimize campaign delivery and reduce failed sends.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about what HLR means and what the operation actually does. Description lacks detail about input format, what data is returned, and why this operation is useful. Added explanation of HLR acronym, input/output details, network information returned, and practical use case for campaign optimization.

data.current_description: Ralise un lookup HLR sur les numros
data.summary_suggestion: Perform HLR lookup on phone numbers
data.description_suggestion: Performs an HLR (Home Location Register) lookup on one or more phone numbers to verify their validity and retrieve network information. HLR lookup confirms whether a number is active on the network and can receive SMS, helping optimize campaign delivery and reduce failed sends.
